channel.title: Need to get a new Laptop
channel.description:
I have 800 USD to spend.... Suggestions? I usually play Minecraft, Code and play Steam games. So something that I can game on... If it's more than 800 I could probably go to 1000 on one... But it really has to be bonerific.
Thanks a lot
Kozs

item.title: Need to get a new Laptop
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

http://www.bestbuy.com/site/desktop-16gb-memory-1tb-hard-drive/6979896.p?id=1218818471131&skuId=6979896&st=categoryid$abcat0501000&cp=1&lp=1

you can easily purchase a cheap $100- monitor.

I personally own that retail build ( I have added stuff to mine but still ) was able to play bf3/mw3 on highest settings no problem, same with crysis 3. Should even be able to play BF4.

Read full topic
item.source: Need to get a new Laptop

item.title: Need to get a new Laptop
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

Newty:

Does it have to be a laptop?

Nope but keep in mind I have to buy a Monitor and a Computer if I didnt.

Read full topic
